dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses module¶

This module provides classes that are used to mirror an OPCUA address space.

The main ‘magic’ (parsing between OPC UA nodes, the mirrored objects and the CANopen comminucation) happens inside descriptors. There are two descriptor classes which only differ in details because there is one for an unsigned integer (which is the predominant data type) and one for a boolean.

@author: Sebastian Scholz

class dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.BoolField(parent, master, name, nodeId, n_scb=None, val=None, n_pspp=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Descriptor class for a boolean.

The setter checks if the value is None or a bool.

Initialize and check if it has a partner in the OD.

Parameters:
  • parent – Points to the parent object in attribute hierarchy
  • master (DCSControllerServer) – The master class providing CAN communication and OPCUA functionality
  • name (str) – Name of this Bool. Needed to make the connection to the object dictionary
  • nodeId (int) – CAN node id of the DCS Controller
  • n_scb (int) – Number of the SCB master if this belongs to one
  • val (bool) – Initial value
  • n_pspp (int) – Number of the PSPP in the serial power chain if this belongs to a PSPP.
val = None¶

bool – Actual value of the attribute

class dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.MyDCSController(master, ua_node, nodeId)[source]¶

Bases: dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.UaObject

Definition of OPC UA object which represents a object to be mirrored in python. This class mirrors it’s UA counterpart and semi-configures itself according to the UA model (generally from XML).

This is the top-level mirror class and represents a DCSControllerType Object. Its direct children are some configuration values (which PSPPs are connected, its CAN node id and a status boolean) and four SCB Masters representing the actual hardware. The latter are created dynamically to decrease verbosity.

NodeId¶

int – The CAN node id of the DCS Controller takes a value between 1 and 127.

Status = None¶

bool – Status of the Controller

class dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.MyMonitoringData(master, ua_node, nodeId, n_scb, n_pspp)[source]¶

Bases: dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.UaObject

Definition of OPC UA object which represents a object to be mirrored in python. This class mirrors it’s UA counterpart and semi-configures itself according to the UA model (generally from XML).

This class mirrors a FolderType Object that contains three UInt16 properties.

int – UInt16 attribute for a PSPP temperature

Voltage1 = None¶

int – UInt16 attribute for a PSPP voltage

Voltage2 = None¶

int – UInt16 attribute for another PSPP voltage

class dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.MyPSPP(master, ua_node, nodeId, n_scb, n_pspp)[source]¶

Bases: dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.UaObject

Definition of OPC UA object which represents a object to be mirrored in python. This class mirrors it’s UA counterpart and semi-configures itself according to the UA model (generally from XML).

This class mirrors a PSPPType Object. Its children are two Folders and a Boolean property.

ADCChannels = None¶

MyPSPPADCChannels – Mirror a folder for ADC channels

MonitoringData = None¶

MyMonitoringData – Mirroring a folder for monitoring data

Regs = None¶

MyRegs – Mirroring a folder for the PSPP registers

Status = None¶

bool – Status of the PSPP. Default is True.

class dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.MyPSPPADCChannels(master, ua_node, nodeId, n_scb, n_pspp)[source]¶

Bases: dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.UaObject

Definition of OPC UA object which represents a object to be mirrored in python. This class mirrors it’s UA counterpart and semi-configures itself according to the UA model (generally from XML).

This class mirrors all 13 PSPP registers. Each has a length of one byte. The instance attributes are created dynamically to decrease verbosity.

class dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.MyRegs(master, ua_node, nodeId, n_scb, n_pspp)[source]¶

Bases: dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.UaObject

Definition of OPC UA object which represents a object to be mirrored in python. This class mirrors it’s UA counterpart and semi-configures itself according to the UA model (generally from XML).

This class mirrors all 13 PSPP registers. Each has a length of one byte. The instance attributes are created dynamically to decrease verbosity.

class dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.MySCBMaster(master, ua_node, nodeId, n_scb)[source]¶

Bases: dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.UaObject

Definition of OPC UA object which represents a object to be mirrored in python. This class mirrors it’s UA counterpart and semi-configures itself according to the UA model (generally from XML).

This class mirrors a SCB Master which is a FolderType Object and contains 16 PSPPType Objects which are created dynamically to decrease verbosity.

isinit = None¶

bool – If the ‘ConnectedPSPPs’ attribute has been set from outside

number¶

int – Number of this SCB master (0-3)

Bases: object

Subscription Handler. To receive events from server for a subscription. The handler forwards updates to it’s referenced python object

datachange_notification(node, val, data)[source]¶

Write incoming value from the server to mirrored object

This method passes the value to the respective descriptor which handles the actual writing.

class dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.TestClass(logger)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class only exists for testing the mirror classes with less overhead than the whole server containing CANopen communication.

Do nothing

start()[source]¶

Create one mirrored DCS Controller and start the OPC server

class dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.UIntField(parent, master, name, nodeId, n_scb=None, bitlength=64, val=None, n_pspp=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Descriptor class for an unsigned integer of variable bit length.

The setter checks if the value is None or a valid integer.

__init__(parent, master, name, nodeId, n_scb=None, bitlength=64, val=None, n_pspp=None)[source]¶

Initialize and check if it has a partner in the OD.

Parameters:
  • parent – Points to the parent object in attribute hierarchy
  • master (DCSControllerServer) – The master class providing CAN communication and OPCUA functionality
  • name (str) – Name of this UInt. Needed to make the connection to the object dictionary
  • nodeId (int) – CAN node id of the DCS Controller
  • n_scb (int) – Number of the SCB master if this belongs to one
  • bitlength (int) – Defines maximum size. Defaults to 64 bits.
  • val (int) – Initial value
  • n_pspp (int) – Number of the PSPP in the serial power chain if this belongs to a PSPP.
bitlength = None¶

int – Maximum length in bits of this unsigned integer

val = None¶

int – Actual value of the attribute

class dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.UaObject(master, ua_node)[source]¶

Bases: object

Python object which mirrors an OPC UA object Child UA variables/properties are auto subscribed to to synchronize python with UA server. Python can write to children via write method, which will trigger an update for UA clients.

This class redefines the __getattribute__ and __setattr__ methods so that descriptors work with instance attributes. This is necessary because in order to mirror the address space correctly the attributes have to be instance attributes.

write(attr=None)[source]¶

Write value of mirrored object to OPC UA node.

If a specific attr isn’t passed to write, write all OPC UA children.

Currently this is unused because all the writing is handled by the respective descriptor objects.

Parameters:attr (str) – The attribute to write

Returns:If the value fulfills the conditions

Raises:TypeError – If the value is not a bool
dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.check_uint(value, bitlength=64)[source]¶

Check if a value is an unsigned integer of a specified length

Parameters:
  • value – The Value to check
  • bitlength (int) – Maximum number of bits that the value must stick to.
Returns:

If the value fulfills the conditions
Return type:

bool
Raises:
  • TypeError – If the value is not an integer
  • ValueError – If the value exceeds the given range
dcsControllerServer.mirrorClasses.get_address(name, n_scb=None, n_pspp=None, inst=None)[source]¶

Get object dictionary address based on the name.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – Attribute name
  • n_scb (int) – SCB master number (0-3)
  • n_pspp (int) – Number of the PSPP in its SCB chain (0-15)
  • inst – The descriptor object calling this method. Needed to distinguish between nodes that have the same display names.
Returns:

OD index or None if name does not fit int: OD subindex or None if name does not fit
Return type:

int

  • n_pspp (int) – Number of the PSPP in its SCB chain (0-15)
